def-en: Part of a model or process that has a specific function and that can be used in other models or processes, without changing it, to do the same task.
def-ga: Cuid de shamhail nó de phróiseas a bhfuil feidhm ar leith aici agus ar féidir í a úsáid i samhail nó i bpróiseas eile, gan í athrú, chun an tasc céanna a dhéanamh.
notes: Tá an téarma seo comhchiallach le 'modúl'.
